snippet: Mr. Morgan, a former “Saturday Night Live” and “30 Rock” cast member, was in an accident on the New Jersey Turnpike early Saturday that killed one person, the police said. A truck driver was charged in the crash.
abstract: Police say actor and comedian Tracy Morgan, a former cast member on both Saturday Night Live and 30 Rock, is critically injured in traffic accident on the New Jersey Turnpike that kills fellow comedian James McNair; truck driver Kevin Roper is charged with one count of death by auto and four counts of assault by auto.

byline.original: By EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS and DAVE ITZKOFF
byline.contributor: Bryon McWilliams and Michael Schwirtz contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Morgan, a former “Saturday Night Live” and “30 Rock” cast member, was in an accident on the New Jersey Turnpike early Saturday that killed one person, the police said. A truck driver was charged in the crash.

headline.main: Tracy Morgan Critically Hurt in New Jersey Car Crash
headline.print_headline: Comedian Critically Hurt in New Jersey Car Crash
